about.title: About Me
about.description: With a passion for both technology and design, I develop scalable, high-performance applications that captivate users and drive success.

projects.title: PDFuse
projects.description: Transform PDF's into concise summaries using AI. Get a beautiful reel of the document in seconds.

projects.title: PrepWise
projects.description: AI-powered interview preparation tool that helps users practice for technical interviews with real-time feedback.

projects.title: AI Medical Assistant
projects.description: The AI Medical Assistant is a state-of-the-art system that leverages AI technologies to help analyze medical conditions from both speech input (symptoms description) and medical images (X-rays, CT scans, etc.).

responsibilities: Currently learning and exploring Generative AI (GenAI).
Building foundational skills in software development through self-driven projects and coursework.
Actively participating in online communities and contributing to open-source projects.
Eager to apply my knowledge and grow as a professional in the tech industry.
Gaining hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and cloud platforms.
Learning tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, and GitHub Actions.
Understanding best practices for automation, deployment, and infrastructure as code.
Working on personal projects to apply DevOps principles in real-world scenarios.
Learning Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) to strengthen logic building and problem-solving skills.
Practicing coding problems on platforms like LeetCode, Codeforces, and HackerRank.
Implementing various algorithms and data structures in different programming languages.
Participating in coding challenges and contests to improve speed and accuracy.
